title: Sustainability
description:
The word "sustainability" is presented as the infinity symbol, with no beginning and no end, constantly renewing itself. Resembling a blueprint, the architect's primary tool for constructing a new building project, Paula Scher has presented the word "sustainability" in plan, section and elevation. The white letters on a blue ground provide maximum legibility while the reference to architectural plans allows for an intense scrutiny of the word itself.
Instructions for assembly at bottom.
